title: Demons In Society | Interview With James Annitto
description:
Is the demonic world taking a stronger hold on society? Are so many of the horrid acts that we see in society ultimately driven by demonic forces? Today we discuss demons in society. Where they have been, where they are now, and where are they going? Demonologist James Annitto joins us to discuss the world of the demonic, on The Grave Talks.
 
PART 2 - AVAILABLE TO GRAVE KEEPERS ONLY - LISTEN HERE In part two of our interview, available only to Grave Keepers, we discuss:

 
What happened in a case that James was involved in, that an exorcist was also called into, turned out to be fraudulent. 

How did a woman make it appear as though she was experiencing true physical possession? 

How difficult is it to call out a true demonic case? 


As a Grave Keeper, for $5 per month you will get:
